column1: The generosity of Northeast Ohioans never ceases to amaze me. We are #InThisTogetherOhio. https://t.co/cs8z2VUyfA
Happy Thanksgiving! While our celebrations look different this year I wish you and your family a healthy safe and blessed holiday. https://t.co/0C5KdgeC4I
Congratulations to the Lake Catholic Cougars on a great season and hard-fought playoff bout. I’m looking forward to seeing this team continue on their progress next season! https://t.co/p2JpN6W6IE
God bless our veterans who fought to protect the greatest country in the world. This #VeteransDay and every day we honor them for their bravery and selflessness. 🇺🇸 https://t.co/RlXpjhrKTx
We won every county. I will continue to be a fighter for all of my constituents. Thank you OH-14! 🙌🏻 https://t.co/KCo5Pv6xSg

We did it! I am deeply honored to once again have earned the trust of voters here in Ohio’s 14th district. I look forward to returning to Washington to do what I’ve always done: put people before party and solutions over politics. https://t.co/J9QjUT4gFZ
Thanks to this awesome group of @OhioCRs for making the trip up to Northeast Ohio to help me get out the vote! 🇺🇸 https://t.co/YZPeUXdcqt

Ohio is a critical state and early returns show us this race could be close so make sure you get out and vote! If you have already voted I challenge you right now to call a neighbor family member or friend in #OH14. Make sure they go out and vote for Dave! https://t.co/xp5TYHosjg
Thanks to Verdi’s Italian Market for the delicious spread that kept our volunteers fed today! https://t.co/RnXXRddrMl
Get out and vote! I just cast my ballot for 4 more years of @realdonaldtrump! #VoteOhio 🇺🇸 https://t.co/Bc6NStuYGE
It’s game day baby! Dave is on @wtam1100 right now and Team Joyce is cheering him on at HQ! https://t.co/7jJCHtCFKa
It’s finally here: Today is election day! Visit https://t.co/A7teumRT50 to verify your polling location. If you haven’t voted make sure you get to the polls! https://t.co/MZo0AjUfXZ
Every yard sign every door knock every phone call…it’s made a difference. Thank you for your support now I need your vote. https://t.co/w9zUQEo8tu

REMINDER: Tomorrow is the final day of early voting. The board of elections will be open from 8:00 AM to 2:00 PM for you to cast your ballot. Visit https://t.co/9SRToQYq9f to find your polling location. https://t.co/ZOAdsVjHeU
A little ❄️ doesn’t stop Team Joyce from winning at the doors! https://t.co/5abpFisSxl

I’m proud to be endorsed by Lake County Sheriff Frank Leonbruno. Frank has served in the Sheriff’s office for over 30 years. I stand with him in making public safety a top priority for residents and will continue to have the backs of our law enforcement heroes in Washington. https://t.co/FxlU0ru3fR
Chatting with voters who requested absentee ballots! Remember to have your ballot postmarked by November 2nd. Visit https://t.co/9SRToQGPhH for more information. https://t.co/dr0W7IAB17
With only 3 days until Election Day our team is hard at work taking my message directly to voters. Thank you to all who joined me in Lake County today! https://t.co/dmUzli1WBo

I’m proud to receive the endorsement of @IUOELocal18 and will continue to stand with them to grow our economy protect workers’ rights and rebuild our country’s crumbling infrastructure. https://t.co/OwTDScOUve

Thanks to @Surgeon_General and @DepSecHargan for visiting @STERIS a Northeast Ohio company who’s innovation allowed healthcare workers and first responders the ability to sanitize and reuse PPE like N95 masks. https://t.co/FD7CIf9mir

I voted to provide forgivable loans that small businesses are using to keep employees on payroll and provided  flexibility for how and when they can use these resources. We need leaders who understand the needs of our small business community. That’s why I’m endorsed by @NFIB. https://t.co/Tj8N49To0x

As co-chair of the House Nursing Caucus and the husband of a nurse fighting for better healthcare is personal to me. I am grateful to the @RNAction for their endorsement and I know that together we can continue our mission of supporting our nation’s incredible nurses. https://t.co/V6C11TsrN4

🚨 5 Days until Election Day! Have you made a plan to vote? Visit https://t.co/u3nexZj4iL to learn more about early voting and to find your polling location if you're voting on Election Day. https://t.co/16vwQ01W0F

Whether it’s Ohio’s teachers healthcare workers small business community newspapers or labor unions Dave Joyce's endorsements from leading organizations highlight his proven ability to deliver results on issues impacting Northeast Ohioans. Share if you stand with Dave! https://t.co/PtG9XyoaKA

On a panel I hosted this month we discussed how the pandemic has made it more difficult for human trafficking crimes to be reported. Congress must provide law enforcement with every resource it needs to combat human trafficking and help survivors. https://t.co/7OhNgE0MKL
A great profile on the small business community in downtown Mantua. I enjoyed my tour of Restoration 44 Coffee Company last week! https://t.co/U97XsTIsJ0
Thank you Mayor Bob Fiala for your endorsement! https://t.co/ZNAYvZ2VgV
Thank you @battleground_ua! https://t.co/j5TEhMeEvj
Congratulations to Justice Amy Coney Barrett! https://t.co/g2HtmrAGES
Thank you to all who came to our “Donuts with Dave” Drive-in and door launch with the Mayfield Heights Republican Club this weekend! https://t.co/1F5h3lPo6F

I’m proud to have once again earned the endorsement of the Western Lake County FOP. As a prosecutor I worked closely with these brave men and women to keep our communities safe. Now I work to provide them with the resources they need. I will always have law enforcement's back. https://t.co/eY7dUk5Sd1
Congratulations Max! We’re proud to have you on #TeamJoyce. https://t.co/HCxvNyt1dZ
Thank you Mayor Womer Benjamin for your endorsement and continued support! https://t.co/N2bMmtcbv2
Tonight is the final Presidential Debate and I want to hear from you! What issue are you most excited to hear the candidates talk about?

Did you know that the board of elections is expanding their hours for you to cast your vote early in-person including weekends? Visit https://t.co/9SRToQGPhH to look up your polling location and make a plan to vote. https://t.co/mfEzqzwxxM

Thank you @OhioEA for your endorsement. Educators already had a difficult job. Now we are relying on them to provide stability for our children. I pledge to continue supporting teachers with the resources they need to keep our children safe while providing a quality education. https://t.co/RKlHpSreNN

Did you catch this letter to the editor in the @beaconjournal this morning? Thank you to Gary from Stow for letting residents know about my important work to end the opioid epidemic. https://t.co/8F0bxojPCK https://t.co/eDHo0jFKKE

When the pandemic hit I worked closely with Governor DeWine to save lives. I led the charge in Congress to secure more than $100 billion dollars for hospitals ensured medical workers had critical supplies to stay safe and voted to make coronavirus testing free. https://t.co/e3GqgnqImD

Honored to be endorsed by the OSMA the state’s largest group of physicians. I worked closely with them to release a set of guidelines for states to safely reopen our economy while protecting our health. I will continue to seek their counsel as we fight this virus. https://t.co/l4CKHMByWo

From Team Joyce: We have just #14days until we re-elect a fighter for #OH14 families. We’re gearing up for a massive get out the vote effort next week and Dave needs your help. Sign-up to make calls knock doors deliver yard signs or work the polls at https://t.co/u6gHkmhYGR. https://t.co/KZTTuy38QL

I’m proud to have earned the endorsement of the Cleveland American Middle East Organization! In Congress I serve on the U.S. Lebanon Friendship Caucus and have relied on CAMEO to keep me informed on issues that are important to the Middle Eastern community in Northeast Ohio. https://t.co/GKk2sl4CF3
It was a great day of connecting with voters in Summit County. Thanks to  @RoemerBill and Boston Heights Mayor Bill Goncy for joining me on the campaign trail! https://t.co/1gJoZ0Wz8q

@RimecoProducts in Willoughby manufacturers high quality machined aircraft components and is sustaining jobs despite the pandemic. Thanks for hosting myself and @ElectCirino for a tour! https://t.co/iT3SJrvaiP

Great news for Conneaut and Ashtabula County! This critical infrastructure project is expected to create 168 full time jobs and 1600 jobs during construction and bring new transportation services to the area. https://t.co/9P7CWk9C0k
Did you know you can vote early? Make sure you know your options! Visit our campaign’s website to learn more and to find your polling location. https://t.co/9SRToQGPhH

We are 21 days from Election Day! Will you take our campaign’s #3weekcountdown challenge by signing up to volunteer for three hours to help Dave get his message out to voters? Find our 21 day plan of action and sign-up for your volunteer shifts here: https://t.co/sadFpxivwd https://t.co/UFEHXkif0a
Here we go Brownies here we go! #INDvsCLE 🐶 https://t.co/SM2wENzyrO

Our campaign is proud to receive the endorsement of @AWAction_News!  The way we treat animals is a measure of our decency. I have worked across the aisle to sponsor numerous pieces of legislation aimed at preventing the callous treatment of animals. Winnie agrees! https://t.co/nuaWooVFVh

Thank you to everyone who came to our annual clambake last night! While we had to adjust our format to a drive-thru to adhere to social distancing guidelines I’m still overwhelmed by the show of support for my campaign. 🍁 🌽 🎃 https://t.co/CP4AWj94TO

I'm proud to have led the charge to restore our waterways such as the Cuyahoga and Ashtabula Rivers. These efforts will further protect the Great Lakes help restore our local economy create jobs and expand other commercial and recreational opportunities. https://t.co/zeYkCjXxGC

Last week FBI Special Agent in charge Eric Smith told the Bipartisan Task Force to End Sexual Violence that human trafficking remains a serious problem in Ohio. Congress must provide these agencies with any and all tools to stop these crimes. Read more: https://t.co/BLLakcoMVG

The pandemic taught us an important lesson: our reliance on China for lifesaving medicine and supplies must end. Watch our campaign’s new TV ad highlighting the efforts of local manufacturer @RBSigma and my work in Congress to hold China accountable and bring jobs back to Ohio. https://t.co/eeUW8zUV6L

Early voting in Ohio has begun! Starting today you can safely cast your vote in-person at your county board of elections. For more information on how to vote early and to look up the address of your polling location please visit https://t.co/9SRToQGPhH. https://t.co/dfFjnU9W8Z

I’m proud to have the endorsement of @NFIB and to have earned support from small business owners across Northeast Ohio. Now more than ever we need leaders in Congress who understand the hardships of our small businesses and who are fighting to help them recover. https://t.co/wBCiHS54A5
ELECTION DEADLINE: Today is the last day to register to vote in Ohio or to update your voter registration online or in-person! https://t.co/i9IgtAnRzG
One month until Election Day and our team is reaching voters in Painesville Macedonia Highland Heights and Mayfield Village today! Thanks to @SpeakerCupp for joining our team! https://t.co/GfflgcFoBz
We are one month from Election Day! Be sure to verify your voter registration at: https://t.co/g7t5BX54x5. https://t.co/cUPWgkQCTm
I’m proud to be endorsed by the @OSCPA. I look forward to continuing to work with them to strengthen our business community here in Northeast Ohio. https://t.co/WNQyhvIYQA
Praying for a speedy recovery for @realdonaldtrump and @FLOTUS. https://t.co/b4uexKUASb

✅ Jobs and economic recovery ✅ Providing resources to hospitals ✅ Protecting and preserving the Great Lakes   To learn more about my top priorities in Congress take a moment to read my profile in @WKBN:  https://t.co/CRbTVgPEXM

From Team Joyce: Congratulations to our intern of the month Leo Thuman! Leo is the former President of the Case Western Reserve University College Democrats. Take a moment to listen below to find out why Leo supports Dave. https://t.co/P3IBlOHVzL
@GeaugaYRs Thanks for your hard work Chris!

I'm proud to be endorsed by @clevelanddotcom. Thank you for continuing to recognize my bipartisan efforts to protect Lake Erie our health care and our way of life. I look forward to continuing to advocate for Northeast Ohio families in Congress. https://t.co/XWZZHAiRwh

The signs of fall are starting to pop-up across OH-14! Our team stopped into Patterson Fruit Farm after dropping off their sign to pick up some local favorites. We still have yard signs available for delivery. Sign up to display one in your yard at https://t.co/u6gHkmhYGR. https://t.co/VjetfuUGib
Wishing an easy and meaningful fast to all those observing Yom Kippur. https://t.co/6TTBbNiaHW

Proud to introduce bipartisan bicameral legislation that extends the Payroll Support Program for airline industry employees. This program funded by the CARES Act has been critical for keeping workers on payroll amidst the pandemic. https://t.co/ZtJBFq6jEA

Happy #NationalDaughtersDay to my own Bridey and Keighle. Kelly and I are so proud of the incredible young leaders you’ve both become. Best wishes to all the daughters today! 👨‍👩‍👧‍👧 https://t.co/XwdJcQH6n7

I’m proud to have earned the endorsement of the hardworking men and women at the @UAPipeTrades. I pledge to continue supporting energy and infrastructure projects fighting for prevailing wage laws and advocating for more project labor agreements. https://t.co/ax5ArShkxk

Citing my decades of experience bipartisan cooperation and role in fighting for Northeast Ohio on the House Appropriations Committee the @TribToday Editorial Board strongly endorsed my reelection campaign. Read more here: https://t.co/Q39CoEImEO
Thanks to @JasonWuliger for hosting a #TeamJoyce phone bank tonight! We’re letting voters know about all of the ways they can safely cast their ballot in this election. https://t.co/cNBtNeK1Kk

Our new ad captures the story of Greg McNeil who lost his son Sam to the opioid epidemic. Greg turned tragic loss into an inspiring mission by founding @cover2resources. His story drives me every day as an advocate in Congress for families impacted by this crisis. Watch here: https://t.co/CVoXjhFU1v

Today is #NationalVoterRegistrationDay! In Ohio the deadline to register to vote or update your voter registration is October 5th. Don’t miss the chance to make your voice heard in this critical election. https://t.co/xPsaYUwoNq

I am a firm believer in bipartisanship and compromise. Last week the Problem Solvers Caucus proposed a new coronavirus relief package. Congress needs to put party aside and take action to help struggling families overcome the challenges of this pandemic. https://t.co/gpIMSSqVZi

Super Saturday checklist:  ✅ Masks ✅ Hand sanitizer ✅ Perfect NEO weather ✅ Fired up volunteers   With less than 50 days until Election Day we’d love to have you on our team. Sign up to volunteer at our next Super Saturday at https://t.co/u6gHkmhYGR. https://t.co/0cNPjnUt7C

The first ballots of the election are being sent today to uniformed service members and overseas voters. This additional time to cast ballots is important for our military heroes and citizens living abroad. If you applied to be a UOCAVA voter keep an eye out for your ballot! https://t.co/LBa2328gBT
Wishing a happy and sweet New Year to all celebrating #RoshHashanah. Shana Tova! https://t.co/XvjGKp0bjB

Happy 73rd birthday to the United States Air Force! Many great Americans gave the ultimate sacrifice in building America’s air superiority. Today we honor them and thank our active duty airmen and airwomen for their service. https://t.co/qLSd2GABM7

Exciting News: Today we launched our first TV ad! 📺 Lake County Sheriff Frank Leonbruno knows I will continue to reject calls to defund the police and work to keep #OH14 families safe. Watch here! https://t.co/YSKJXFFAx8

Thank you to my colleagues in the House for helping me honor a local fallen hero Lance Corporal Andy “Ace” Nowacki by voting to dedicate the Grand River Post Office in his name. Northeast Ohio will never forget his sacrifice. ❤️ 🇺🇸 https://t.co/K8ODcdajVM

This morning #TeamJoyce joined @lakegopohio candidates to make thousands of phone calls and knock on thousands of doors. Together we will leave no voter untouched ahead of November! https://t.co/0KYGd3bzF8

19 years ago our nation was under attack. While 9/11 is a day marked by tragedy it’s also a reminder of America’s resolve and the bravery of our law enforcement officers firefighters and countless unnamed heroes. America will always rise from the ashes stronger. #NeverForget https://t.co/SmxXcu4Pmc

If you’re a registered voter you should be receiving an absentee ballot application in the mail. I encourage you to take advantage of voting from the comfort and safety of your home. You can also print a copy and get step-by-step instructions by visiting https://t.co/9SRToQGPhH. https://t.co/Xa1axNFn0B

America was built on the backs of hardworking men and women. On Labor Day we acknowledge those resting as well as the essential workers who are unable to take today off including first responders military service members and others. #LaborDay https://t.co/dU0S6noT0R
Wrapped up an action-packed day on the campaign trail with a socially distanced ‘Women for Dave’ patio party. Thank you Elizabeth and Thurston for hosting us! https://t.co/KFVESgk56u

Great conversations at the first-ever Punjabi-Americans for Dave coalition roundtable. These healthcare and business leaders discussed how COVID-19 has affected their communities and how Congress can continue to provide support. I’m proud to have them in my corner this election. https://t.co/YEnJrns2c2

Thank you to the @clevelanddotcom editorial board for recognizing my efforts to leverage technology to lower military suicide rates. We must utilize any and all resources available to support our military and ensure they have the care they need. https://t.co/TVvRD1Xq0T

Thank you John! We just got more 4x8 signs at #TeamJoyce HQ. Let us know if you’d like one for your home or business by emailing alex@joyceforcongress.com. https://t.co/bqNvIWzPp0

Families in every corner of Ohio have been devastated by the opioid epidemic. On International Overdose Awareness Day we renew our fight to end the stigma of overdoses and expand recovery options for survivors. This year has been especially hard but we can’t quit. #IOAD2020💜 https://t.co/jXxeDlN0N9

#TeamJoyce is out in full force in Brecksville today! If you see one of our team members in our new “Pray for America” hats take a moment to speak with them to learn about Dave’s fight to protect Northeast Ohio values. https://t.co/WFJ0BJyyHr

The News Herald editorial board applauded my efforts urging House leadership to pass comprehensive opioid legislation. As overdoses skyrocket during COVID-19 Congress must move quickly to pass my legislation the COPE Act to help battle this epidemic. https://t.co/KBk9L5LiJo

Thanks to Eastlake Councilmen John Meyers & Dave Spotton for the help knocking doors today with #TeamJoyce & #TeamWuliger. 73 days until the November election- sign up to volunteer at https://t.co/u6gHkmhYGR https://t.co/7Xp0z3SuKY

Thank you @realdonaldtrump for signing my bill the Safeguarding America’s First Responders Act of 2020 into law. This critical legislation guarantees financial security to the families of our heroic first responders battling COVID-19 on the frontlines. https://t.co/kjW3XljZfn

This week I announced a partnership between a Mentor manufacturer and @FrankLarose’s office to deliver PPE directly to poll workers for Election Day. @RBSigma will be donating nearly half a million masks to all of Ohio’s county boards of elections. https://t.co/ilVr4YHvn9

Receiving the endorsement of the @wildlifeaction is an honor. I’ve always been proud to be called the “The Great Lakes guy” by my colleagues in Congress. Whether you’re a Republican or Democrat we must continue working to protect our natural habitat for future generations. https://t.co/1yFUbxS1wQ

100 years ago today the United States formally ratified the 19th Amendment giving women the right to vote. Ohio played a crucial role in the suffragist movement having been one of the original states to ratify the amendment allowing it to be adopted into law. https://t.co/LzIX8SmmMR

The opioid epidemic has ravaged our communities and COVID-19 has only made the problem worse. Everyday Congress refuses to act more people suffer. I’m calling on Speaker Pelosi to bring my bill the COPE Act to a vote ASAP. https://t.co/A8G0ZX8wNi

Thank you to members of @NATCA in NE Ohio for joining me on a virtual discussion and helping #TeamJoyce make thousands of phone calls to voters. Happy 30th anniversary to my sweetheart! I couldn’t have asked for a more loving caring and generous partner in life. https://t.co/wr6ZymMyMp

Welcome to Northeast Ohio Mr. President! https://t.co/S1VIMsiRnn
